wikipedia_page.main: Patrick John Sweeney (born 12 August 1952) is a retired coxswain for Great Britain's rowing team. Sweeney competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics, 1976 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics.

response: * 1988 – Bronze, Coxed Pair (with Andy Holmes and Patrick Sweeney)
* 1989 – 5th, Coxed Pairs (with Simon Berrisford and Patrick Sweeney)
* 1987 – Silver, Coxed Pairs (with Andy Holmes and Patrick Sweeney)
* 1986 – Gold, Coxed Pairs (with Andy Holmes and Patrick Sweeney)
